H0.text: what type of economic system was utilized in the soviet union. Socialism

H1.text: what type of economic system was utilized in the soviet union. Command Economy

H2.text: what type of economic system was utilized in the soviet union. State Capitalism

H3.text: what type of economic system was utilized in the soviet union. communism

A4.text: An administrative-command system managed a distinctive form of central planning.

A5.text: According to communist theory, capital (means of production) should not be individually owned, with certain negligible exceptions.

A6.text: Lenin described his policies as state capitalism but saw them as necessary for the development of socialism
